While the Al Rasheed rallied the majority of other tribes to their side the effort proved futile

LOT_NAN_friendship_decision_desc;Years ago
column2: Edward IV
column3: King of Beornia
column4: has helped us install order in our country
column5: when the vile Monarchist regime had seized power. It is past time we paid tribute to this great man
column6: who stood up for our security and traditions in times of peril.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: conquest_of_the_desertNAN_title;Conquest of the Desert;;;;;;;;;;;;;

conquest_of_the_desertNAN_desc;The Beornians have always tried to expand into the Mapuche lands. But their harsh resistance led to a treaty that delimited the border around the river Graham. But now the Beornians have the advantage on the Mapuche tribes and it is needed to secure these lands before the Incans do the same.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
conquest_of_the_desertLOT_title;Conquest of the Desert;;;;;;;;;;;;;

conquest_of_the_desertLOT_desc;The Beornians have always tried to expand into the Mapuche lands. But their harsh resistance led to a treaty that delimited the border around the river Graham. But we are not bound by previous treaties
column2: and while our government doesn't see the conquest of the southern lands as important as the Beornians genereally do
column3: we certainly have the advantage on the Mapuche tribes and it is needed that we secure these lands before the Incans do the same.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: occupation_of_araucaniaINC_title;Occupation of Araucania;;;;;;;;;;;;;

occupation_of_araucaniaINC_desc;A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. The Mapuche have refused for centuries to accept our rule and it is our duty to spread the glory of the Inca in the Southern Andes;;;;;;;;;;;;;
exploration_of_Amazonia_GRA_title; Exploration of Amazonia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
exploration_of_Amazonia_GRA_desc; The vast jungles along the Amazon river are void and non-occupied. From our bases in Para we can claim the are and take the territory for ourselves;;;;;;;;;;;;;
exploration_of_Amazonia_GUY_title; Exploration of Amazonia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
exploration_of_Amazonia_GUY_desc; The vast jungles along the Amazon river are void and non-occupied. From our bases in Para we can claim the are and take the territory for ourselves;;;;;;;;;;;;;
ATL_recognized_title; Atlantia in the Federation;;;;;;;;;;;;;
ATL_recognized_desc; Lotharingia is now forced to recognize the inclusion of Atlantia in the Amazonian Federation. All hail Amazonia !;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Manifest_destiny_AMADEM_title; Southern Ambitions;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Manifest_destiny_AMADEM_desc; With Atlantia integrated in the Federation many in the high spheres have asked for expansion into Lotharingia. Many plans have been proposed but which one will get the vote of the Parliament ?;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_guarani_title; Integration of the Guaranis;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_guarani_desc;Now that we have conquered territories where reside Guaranis
column2: we can integrate them into the Federation to counterbalance the Lotharian influence in the area
column3: a move the Lotharians won't like.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

new_amsterdam_treaty_border_desc; Now we are in control of Libreville and Nouvelle-Alsace
column2: we should assemble the Lotharian representatives to try to make them accept our rule. However should they refuse
column3: it would be an action that could spark a revolt in the new territories...;;;;;;;;;;;;;

new_amsterdam_treaty_guarani_desc; With our control over the new states of the Federation established

column3: it would be an action that could spark a revolt in the new territories...;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column2: we should assemble the Lotharian representatives to try to make them accept our rule. However should they refuse

column1: Ameriga_AMA_title; The Federation;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Ameriga_AMA_desc; Despite the wars with Lotharingia
column2: we now stand proud as the dominant power of Ameriga. We can now unify the two former Frankish colonies into a single state that will rivalize with the Great European Powers. Long Live Ameriga !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: Northern_border_title;The Northern Border;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Northern_border_desc;North of the vast Amazonian jungle is located the old Spanish territories of Guyana. With the forest an integral part of our country we have to act and annex the border to avoid any threats to it.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Federation_NAN_title;Beornia in the Federation;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Federation_NAN_desc;With our control of Eastern Ameriga complete and secured some of our politics have talked to integrate Beornia into the Federation. They are likely to refuse but their small size will let us integrate them by force if necessary. /n /n §RWarning: If you get a negative responce then you will need to take 15 infamy to proceed.§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
NAN_congress_title;The Beornian Congress;;;;;;;;;;;;;

NAN_congress_desc;With the old Beornian capital in our hands and their country under our control we can call a council to try to integrate the Beornians into the Federation. Should they refuse it would mean countless years of opposition from the natives;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Granada_border_title;The Conquest of Granada;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Granada_border_desc;Our Federation now extends from the Caribbean to the Pampas ! But until we secure Granada and Andagoya
column2: we won't truly be the dominant power of Ameriga !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: GRA_congress_title;The Granadan Congress;;;;;;;;;;;;;
GRA_congress_desc;With Cartagena de Indias in our hands and we can call a council to try to integrate the Granadans into the Federation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_beornians_title;Integration of the Beornians;;;;;;;;;;;;;

integrate_beornians_desc;The Congress of Nazareth might have backfired but we ahve taken steps to really integrate the Beornians and assure them that they are true citizens of the Federation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_granadan_title;Integration of the Granadans;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_granadan_desc;Despite our efforts the Granadans have refused to accept our rule over the Northern lands of the continent. With our rule secured over all our claims
column2: it is time to make them true citizens of the Federation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: embrace_ameriganism_title;The Amerigan Ideal;;;;;;;;;;;;;
embrace_ameriganism_desc;Ameriga is at last truly united! From Cartagena to Port-Liberté
column2: from the Falklands to the Chaco
column3: our flag is hoisted high! The next century will be our time to shine
column4: but for that we need the weary of the Old World!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: independent_equinoxia_title;Equinoxian independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;
independent_equinoxia_desc;France Antarctique has failed to impose their will on our people. We ahve stood against their agressions and shall never be part of the same state as them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
liberty_enlightening_the_world_AZL_title;La Liberté éclairant le Monde;;;;;;;;;;;;;

liberty_enlightening_the_world_AZL_desc;New Amsterdam lacks a defining monument which would show its wealth and new status on the international stage. Designs have been approved for a statue representing the allegory of Liberty with a Phrygian cap to be built in the bay. It would be an important work
column2: one that would show the power of our industry to the rest of the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: AZL_annexation_INC_title;The Subjugation of the Inca;;;;;;;;;;;;;
AZL_annexation_INC_desc;The rump Incan Empire is the last holdout to Federation control of the entire continent. It is time to bring them to heel !;;;;;;;;;;;;;
camelot_renovation_title;Planning the New Nazareth;;;;;;;;;;;;;

camelot_renovation_desc;Nazareth has been the capital of the Kingdom of Beornia since the crowning of the first king Edward I in 1658. The most important city of the country is still a backwards city compared to the rest of the civilized capitals. The city was never really planned and the feudality system that endured here for centuries has led to a poor development. Outside of the Royal Castle and the Alfredian place in the harbor there is a lot of work to do to ensure that Camelot can continue the legacy of the Arthurian legend and grow to be one of the best cities of the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
beornia_inca_border_treaty_title;The Beornian-Incan Border Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;;

beornia_inca_border_treaty_desc;The colonization of Patagonia has seen both our settlers and Incans compete for the New-Cornish lands and it has been deemed important to settle the situation with a treaty recognizing each other claims on the area.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
beornia_inca_border_treaty_unequal_title;Claims on New-Cornwall;;;;;;;;;;;;;

beornia_inca_border_treaty_unequal_desc;The New-Cornish lands have been one of the primary centres of interest of our country in the last past years. With our power unmatched by the pesky Incans it is time we force them to cede all lands that they would have colonized south of their Antisuyu area.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
inca_beornia_border_treaty_title;Control of the South;;;;;;;;;;;;;
inca_beornia_border_treaty_desc;We have competed with Beornia over Mapuche lands and it is time we force them to cede their colonies in the area to us
column2: the natural overlords of the area.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: merge_the_crowns_ari_title;Proclaim the Empire of the Latins;;;;;;;;;;;;;
merge_the_crowns_ari_desc;For centuries now
column2: the crown of Aragon has been a dominant power on the Italian peninsula. We are now strong enough to strengthen our rule over Italy and proclaim the Empire of the Latins
column3: uniting Italy and Aragon under a single Emperor! But let us beware
column4: the other European Great Powers might not take the news kindly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: start_ai_cw_title;End North Italian Autonomy;End North Italian Autonomy;End North Italian Autonomy;;;;;;;;;;;

start_ai_cw_desc;We now have enough power to demand the end of North Italian autonomy. integrate_north_italians_desc;With the end of North Italian autonomy we can now integrate them into the social fabric of our empire. venetian_question_title;The Venetian Question;;;;;;;;;;;;;

venetian_question_desc;Venice - while distinct from the rest of the country - is Italian and thus should be a part of our realm.\nWith our control over Northern Italy cemented we can now focus on making it so.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
latin_empire_title;Proclaim the Latin Empire;Proclaim the Latin Empire;Proclaim the Latin Empire;;;;;;;;;;;
latin_empire_desc;As we are the heirs of the Roman Empire
column2: in our increased power after the end of North Italian autonomy and North Italian integration we can now proclaim the Latin Empire and claim the Western Mediterranean.;As we are the heirs of the Roman Empire
column3: in our increased power after the end of North Italian autonomy and North Italian integration we can now proclaim the Latin Empire and claim the Western Mediterranean.;As we are the heirs of the Roman Empire
column4: in our increased power after the end of North Italian autonomy and North Italian integration we can now proclaim the Latin Empire and claim the Western Mediterranean.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: annex_provence_title;the Annexation of Provence;;;;;;;;;;;;;

annex_provence_desc;Provence has held for such a long time because of our protection. Now that our Mediterranean ambitions have been stated a peaceful annexation might be possible with sufficient diplomatic pressure.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
unite_arabia_title;Establish the Greater Arabian Caliphate;Proclamons le Califat Arabe;Establish the Greater Arabian Caliphate;;;;;;;;;;;

unite_arabia_desc;We have subdued all other Arabian rulers and expelled the foreign invaders from their courts. The entire Arabian Peninsula kneels before You. Let our dynasty rules the Holy Lands for thousand years by the Grace of Allah.;Nous avons soumis les autres dirigeants arabes et chassé les envahisseurs étrangers de nos terres. La péninsule arabe entière reconnait notre autorité. Que notre dynastie règne sur cette terre sainte pour les milles ans à venir
column2: Incha'Allah!;We have subdued all other Arabian rulers and expelled the foreign invaders from their courts. The entire Arabian Peninsula kneels before You. Let our dynasty rules the Holy Lands for thousand years by the Grace of Allah.;;;;;;;;;;;

erase_vinland_desc;In our quest for the unification of Arcadia
column2: we have fully incorporated the former lands of Vinland. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Arcadian Dream.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: erase_nbg_title;Hold a Conference over New Burgundy;;;;;;;;;;;;;
erase_nbg_desc;In our quest for the unification of Arcadia
column2: we have fully incorporated the former lands of the Confederation of Belgica. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Arcadian Dream.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: embrace_panarcadianism_title;Embrace the Pan-Arcadian Dream;;;;;;;;;;;;;
embrace_panarcadianism_desc;Our country made impossible possible. Where once were petty squabling realms of Plantagenia
column2: New Burgundy and Vinland now resides only Arcadia - the new paradise on Earth. It is now save  to declare Pan-Arcadianism to be a dream come true.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: discuss_capital_title;Discuss the New Capital;;;;;;;;;;;;;
discuss_capital_desc;As Arcadia gradually changed to be an equal federation rather than a hegemony of one of its cultures over the others
column2: voices all around the country call for a discussion over founding a new capital representative of the recently found unity. Maybe it is the time to hear these calls?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: the_continental_congress_arc_title;Hold the Continental Congress;;;;;;;;;;;;;
the_continental_congress_arc_desc;Even though we haven't been able to persuade everyone that accepting the rule of Arcadia is the best thing to do
column2: we are now in control of the former territories of the constituent countries in their entirety. With our citizens experiencing freedom and peace never to be seen before
column3: they now could change their mind?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: accepting_athesia_title;Accepting the Athesians;;;;;;;;;;;;;

accepting_athesia_desc;The Venitian colonists who settled in Athesia have been restless since our takeover of the peninsula. Many share the same values as other Arcadians and if we make the right efforts they will be integrated without problems!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
accepting_caribenos_title;The Caribenos;;;;;;;;;;;;;

accepting_caribenos_desc;The island of Kuba has seen the local settlers develop differently from both the Colombians and the Spanish. The island being in the center of the Caribbean Sea has seen countless traders land in Habana and Santiago and the local plantations are still profitable. Thus it could be easy to ensure our rule on the island by recognizing some autonomy and make the locals accept our rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
accepting_ayitians_title;Control of the Sudurhafeyjar;;;;;;;;;;;;;
accepting_ayitians_desc;The Southern Islands
column2: as they are called in Scandinavian
column3: are home to an important population
column4: one that has grown restless since our occupation of the islands began. They share many similarities with us and with the proper mesures taken we can easily make them accept our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: Western_border_treaty_title;Push to the West;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Western_border_treaty_desc;The unification of Arcadia has led to a great increase of immigrants arriving in our ports. The tension between the former hostile communities of the continent is not helping the new people to integrate efficiently in our country. Thus it was proposed to claim all territories which are currently not fully settled by the Sanbao government in exchange of a generous subsidy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
build_museum_title;An Archaeological Museum;;;;;;;;;;;;;
build_museum_desc;Now that we have excavation rights for our expedition
column2: we should establish a National Museum in our capital to house and display the artifacts we plunder--- er

egyptological_excavations_desc;The Valley of the Kings
column2: Egypt
column3: is a potentially endless source of new archeological discoveries. By petitioning the Egyptian government for a monopoly to carry out excavations in The Valley of the Kings
column4: we can ensure that we make these fantastic discoveries
column5: rather than another Great Power.;;Das Tal der Könige in Ägypten ist eine potentiell unerschöpfliche Quelle neuer archäologischer Entdeckungen. Wenn wir die ägyptische Regierung um ein Monopol auf Ausgrabungen im Tal der Könige bitten
column6: können wir sicherstellen
column7: dass wir anstatt einer anderen Großmacht diese fantastischen Entdeckungen machen.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: forced_egyptological_excavations_title;The Valley of the Kings;La vallée des rois;Das Tal der Könige;;;;;;;;;;;
forced_egyptological_excavations_desc;Since we control Luxor
column2: we can send an expedition to The Valley of The Kings to conduct archeological excavations. Discoveries of Egyptian tombs could increase our prestige.;À présent que nous contrôlons Louxor
column3: nous pouvons dépêcher une expédition dans la vallée des rois pour y conduire des fouilles archéologiques. La découverte de tombeaux égyptiens nous permettrait d'accroître notre prestige.;Da wir Luxor kontrollieren
column4: können wir eine Expedition ins Tal der Könige entsenden
column5: um archäologische Ausgrabungen durchzuführen. Entdeckungen ägyptischer Gräber könnten unser Prestige steigern.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: maya_excavations_decision_title;The Mysterious Ruins of Yucatan;;;;;;;;;;;;;
maya_excavations_decision_desc;When the Andagoya Canal was planned
column2: several expeditions were sent into the depths of Central America. The inhabitants of the deep jungles of Yucatan told them stories of ruined cities and ancient treasures. What precious artifacts may be waiting in the depths of the jungle? We should outfit an expedition and seek permission to explore these ruins--- for the advancement of science

forced_maya_excavations_desc;When the Andagoya Canal was planned
column2: several expeditions were sent into the depths of Central America. The inhabitants of the deep jungles of Yucatan told them stories of ruined cities and ancient treasures. What precious artifacts may be waiting in the depths of the jungle? We should outfit an expedition and explore these ruins--- for the advancement of science
column3: naturally! And since we control the region
column4: we can begin directly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: pompeji_fiorelli_title;Pompeii Entombed;;;;;;;;;;;;;
pompeji_fiorelli_desc;Since the rediscovery of the buried city of Pompeii in the 18th century
column2: treasure-hunters
column3: tomb raiders and adventurers have searched for valuable artefacts in the old Roman civitas. A new generation of archaeologists
column4: diligent and experienced in new techniques and with a broader consciousness of scientific approaches
column5: awaits to start new excavations. Giuseppe Fiorelli---one of those archaeologists
column6: and a patriot
column7: too---will develop a new kind of conservation and excavation in the Campanian fields
column8: from which our nation and science will benefit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: mycenaean_excavations_decision_title;Mycenaean Excavations;;;;;;;;;;;;;
mycenaean_excavations_decision_desc;The secrets of Ancient Greece await!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
forced_mycenaean_excavations_title;Forced Mycenaean Excavations;;;;;;;;;;;;;
forced_mycenaean_excavations_desc;We shall not allow a few misguided locals prevent us from unlocking the secrets of history.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
minoan_excavations_decision_title;Minoan Excavations;;;;;;;;;;;;;
minoan_excavations_decision_desc;We must plunder the secrets of the ancient Minoan civilization
column2: for the good of science.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: forced_minoan_excavations_title;Forced Minoan Excavations;;;;;;;;;;;;;
forced_minoan_excavations_desc;We must plunder the secrets of the ancient Minoan civilization
column2: for the good of science. It matters not what the local government thinks.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: mesopotamian_excavations_decision_title;The Cradle of Civilization;;;;;;;;;;;;;
mesopotamian_excavations_decision_desc;Mesopotamia: the onetime home of Babylonia
column2: Akkadia and Assyria holds great promise for archaeological discovery. We've moved beyond the old methods of tomb-raiding and amateur excavations--- we should outfit a modern expedition and seek permission to explore these lands. We might bring back a few trophies for the museum... and learn something along the way.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: forced_mesopotamian_excavations_title;The Cradle of Civilization;;;;;;;;;;;;;
forced_mesopotamian_excavations_desc;Mesopotamia: the onetime home of Babylonia
column2: Akkadia and Assyria holds great promise for archaeological discovery. We've moved beyond the old methods of tomb-raiding and amateur excavations--- we should outfit a modern expedition and explore these lands. We might bring back a few trophies for the museum... and learn something along the way. And since we control the region
column3: we can begin directly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: dominium_maris_baltici_title; Dominium Maris Baltici;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dominium_maris_baltici_desc; The greatest aspiration of the Kalmar Union has always been the complete control of the Baltic Sea. While the Scandinavians gained several holdings in the region
column2: they still miss Prussia and the Lithuanian coast. Let us claim these areas for the glory of the Union ! ;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: lithuania_kidnapping_title;Take Control of Lithuania;;;;;;;;;;;;;
lithuania_kidnapping_desc;With the rest of the Baltic coast firmly under our control it is time to complete our ambitions and take Lithuania from the Polish.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
reclaimPOM_title;Reclaiming Pomerania;;;;;;;;;;;;;
reclaimPOM_desc;Even if we have lost Pomerania
column2: they are still rightful Scandinavian lands. Let us proclaim it high and wide and let the Germans fear our coming back !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: act_of_union_title;The new act of Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;
act_of_union_desc;The Commonwealth has experienced a severe decay in the last century. Problems with the Sejm
column2: foreign intervention and weakness of the government led to a near break-up of the Union. But now we have reasserted our status in the European Concert and rid ourselves from foreign intervention
column3: we can centralize the state in Warsaw and retake our place in Eastern Europe !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: moldavia_commonwealth_friends_forever_title;Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
moldavia_commonwealth_friends_forever_desc;Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
baltic_cultures_title;The Baltic peoples;;;;;;;;;;;;;
baltic_cultures_desc;The Latvian and Estonian people never truly enjoyed independence
column2: being contested between the Commonwealth and Scandinavia. But in contrary to the Scandinavians
column3: we have a tradition of accepting the local cultures and integrating them in our state ! Long live the Polish rule of Livonia !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: treaty_hadiach_title;Treaty of Hadiach;;;;;;;;;;;;;
treaty_hadiach_desc;The Ruthenians constitute the most important ethnic group in the Commonwealth behind the Polish. Over the centuries
column2: we have tried to integrate in our fabric
column3: granting some of their nobles rights in the Sejm
column4: encouraging the Uniate Church in spreading Catholicism. Now a new proposition has emerged to transform our state into a Polish-Lithuanian-Ruthenian Commonwealth but it needs the approval of the Ruthenian leaders;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: integrate_germans_title;A Germanic Union;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_germans_desc;Over the last centuries

Thus it has been proposed to relocate them in Tejas and Santa Catarina amongst the local Castillian-speaking community where they could be better controlled.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
rename_laofeng_title;Renaming Laofeng;;;;;;;;;;;;;
rename_laofeng_desc;The territories of Dine Bikeyah were first explored by the Dong-guo city states that called the area Laofeng. But now we control the area
column2: we can erase these Chinese names from the maps and call these lands as the Lusitanians always did : Rio Vermelho;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: restore_laofeng_title;Restore Laofeng;;;;;;;;;;;;;
restore_laofeng_desc;The Colombians renamed lands that our ancestors had discovered first. Now that we control the area
column2: we can force the other powers to use the real name of this region : Laofeng;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: dictatorshipCLM_title;Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dictatorshipCLM_desc;Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_granadans_title;Granadan integration;;;;;;;;;;;;;

integrate_granadans_desc;The Draft of the Constitution may have failed but our Empire is now more stable than ever and steps have been made to further integrate the southern provinces into our social fabric. Long live Colombia united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
universityMEX_title;Found the Autonomous University of Mexico;;;;;;;;;;;;;

universityMEX_desc;Gran Colombia has been lacking a good educational system since the independence. Literacy has always been low and the archaic educational system controlled by the Church has not helped alleviate the situation. Our Minister of Education wants to fund an autonomous and secular university in our capital
column2: the first cornerstone of the new Colombian education system.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: universityMEX_SPC_title;Found the Autonomous University of Mexico;;;;;;;;;;;;;

universityMEX_SPC_desc;Our colonies in Gran Colombia continue to have a absolutely abysmal education system since the reconquest. Literacy has always been low and the archaic educational system controlled by the Church has not helped alleviate the situation. Our Minister of Education wants to fund an autonomous and secular university in Mexico City
column2: the first cornerstone of the new Spanish education system.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: end_tribute_relation_title;Refuse Status as Tributary;;;;;;;;;;;;;
end_tribute_relation_desc;Ever since the 18th century
column2: Dahomey has been paying tribute to the Oyo Empire to prevent war. Well we shall have no more of that
column3: Dahomey shall stand on her own legs from now on. We are of course not as strong as them
column4: which is why we've taken the liberty to get some foreign help with professional officers. Let us break free from the Oyo oppression!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: into_ewe_lands_title;Expand Into Ewe Lands;;;;;;;;;;;;;
into_ewe_lands_desc;The Ewe people west of our nation are ruled by unorganized tribes all fighting each other
column2: it is time for us to step in and claim the land in the name of order and the mighty flag of the elephant.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: convert_to_islam_title;Convert to Islam;;;;;;;;;;;;;
convert_to_islam_desc;We've already embraced a part of the Islamic culture and it taught us a lot
column2: maybe we should take it one step further and make Islam our state-religion?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: convert_to_catholicism_title;Convert to Catholicism;;;;;;;;;;;;;
convert_to_catholicism_desc;We've already embraced a part of the western culture and it taught us a lot
column2: maybe we should take it one step further and make Catholicism our state-religion?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: convert_to_protestantism_title;Convert to Protestantism;;;;;;;;;;;;;
convert_to_protestantism_desc;We've already embraced a part of the western culture and it taught us a lot
column2: maybe we should take it one step further and make Protestantism our state-religion?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: expanding_into_northen_savannahs_title;Expand Into The Northern Savannahs;;;;;;;;;;;;;

expanding_into_northen_savannahs_desc;The Savannahs to the north of us are unsettled and free for taking. The few people living there shouldn't be able to resist us and will hopefully just submit instantly. Let's send our troops there to claim the provinces for the great land of the flag of the elephant!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
disputes_with_akan_title; The Dispute with the Akans;;;;;;;;;;;;;
disputes_with_akan_desc;Raiders from the Akan lands have been pillaging our countryside for too long. Since the leaders of the Akan people claim that they are uncontrollable
column2: we can only assume that they are incapable of properly ruling their people. It is time for us to take control of the region and stabilize it ourselves!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: establish_dhy_schools_title;Establish New Schools;;;;;;;;;;;;;

establish_dhy_schools_desc;We can establish new schools throughout the country to better educate the populace and increase he literacy rate. Even though it's an expensive endeavour it will surely improve our research rate!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
establish_dhy_universities_title;Establish New Universities;;;;;;;;;;;;;
establish_dhy_universities_desc;We can establish new universities in the country to educate our people into some of the brightest in Africa
column2: and maybe even the world. Even though this will be very expensive it will make sure we get some of the finest academics!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: dine_bikeyah_pueblos_title;Our claim to Dine Bikeyah;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dine_bikeyah_pueblos_desc;We added the territory of Dine Bikeyah into our realm and we can declare our control of these lands uncontested.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
end_of_kurland_title;Abolish the Duchy of Kurland;;;;;;;;;;;;;

end_of_kurland_desc;Livonia was added to Scandinavia in the XVIth century when the Livonian order reformed into the Grand-Duchy of Livonia. But alas the inheritance of the duchy was contested by the Commonwealth who installed a rival pretender. Eric VIII retook his inheritance during the Second Livonian War but could not retake Kurland who remained an autonomous duchy of the Commonwealth cultivating colonial enterprises and becoming independent under our protection during the German wars. With our recent losses of control in the area
column2: we need to annex it as a counter-move and end the Livonian inheritance in our favor!.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: kurland_annexation_title;The Annexation of Kurland;;;;;;;;;;;;;

kurland_annexation_desc;The last obstacle to our complete domination of the Baltic sea is the small state of Kurland. Livonia was added to Scandinavia in the XVIth century when the Livonian order reformed into the Grand-Duchy of Livonia. But alas the inheritance of the duchy was contested by the Commonwealth who installed a rival pretender. Eric VIII retook his inheritance during the Second Livonian War but could not retake Kurland who remained an autonomous duchy of the Commonwealth cultivating colonial enterprises and becoming independent under our protection during the German wars. It is now time to reclaim their full integration in the kingdom as the rightful King of the Baltic Germans;;;;;;;;;;;;;
become_neu_kurland_title;Become Neu Kurland;;;;;;;;;;;;;
become_neu_kurland_desc;Time to move to the New World instead of staying in this place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
become_neu_kurland_2_title;Becoming New-Kurland;;;;;;;;;;;;;
become_neu_kurland_2_desc;We have been left with only the Neu Kurland islands
column2: it's time to welcome our new destiny!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: master_of_the_antilles_title;Master of the Antilles;;;;;;;;;;;;;
master_of_the_antilles_desc;We have risen as a power in our own right and we can claim the entirety of the Little Antilles!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Purchase_of_St_Andrjew_title;Purchase of St-Andrjew;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Purchase_of_St_Andrjew_desc;The Polish colony lies a few miles from our coast and is only a burden for Warsaw. We could propose them a hefty sum to buy the island.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Purchase_of_Spanish_antilles_title;Purchase the Spanish Antilles;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Purchase_of_Spanish_antilles_desc;The Spanish once led claims to the whole Antilles but now they only control a few islands which serve nothing for them. With a good amount of money and persuasion we can make them integral parts of our principality;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Purchase_of_Aragonese_antilles_title;Purchase of Sant Jordi;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Purchase_of_Aragonese_antilles_desc;The Aragonese Crown possesses a few islands in the Caribbean but in exchange for some money it could easily be passed to us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
martinique_purchase_title;Buying the Martinique;;;;;;;;;;;;;
martinique_purchase_desc;The island of Martinique is the last of the Lesser Antilles we don't possess
column2: a situation we can change with diplomacy and payments...;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: martinique_purchase2_title;Buying the Martinique;;;;;;;;;;;;;
martinique_purchase2_desc;The island of Martinique is the last of the Lesser Antilles we don't possess
column2: a situation we can change with diplomacy and payments...;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: SCA_purchase_antilles_title;Purchase Gundershavn;;;;;;;;;;;;;
SCA_purchase_antilles_desc;Gundershavn and Larshavn were the jewel of the Scandinavian crown until the Sudurhafeyjar were colonized and now they serve nothing for their empire
column2: but they are very valuable to the Curonian people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: montserrat_purchase_title;The purchase of Montserrat;;;;;;;;;;;;;
montserrat_purchase_desc;The island of Montserrat shares the same fate as Sant Jordi
column2: that's why we must acquire it!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: cristobal_purchase_title;The Cristobal Purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;
cristobal_purchase_desc;The Spanish Crown has no interest in keeping this little rock in their possession
virgin_islands_title;Buying the Iles Vierges;;;;;;;;;;;;;
virgin_islands_desc;The Dual-Monarchy colonized three little islands
column2: commonly known as the Virgin islands as to have safe harbors between Amazonia and Plantagenia. With both colonies lost they have lost their purpose and lie in our sphere of interest.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: create_british_empire_title;Pass the Act of Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;
create_british_empire_desc;Uniting the Kingdoms of England
column2: Wales
column3: Scotland and Ireland is the final step in our campaign of forging the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. Thanks to our position
column4: we are protected by seas in every direction. Perhaps
column5: if we create something like the Royal Navy
column6: we will be able to maintain naval supremacy and dominate the oceans. Now we can finally sing our new anthem - Rule

column1: ENL_recognized_title;English independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;
ENL_recognized_desc;With an independent English government established
column2: the Dual-Monarchy is forced to stop claiming the lands in their possession;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: ENL_claim_title;Reclaim England !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

ENL_claim_desc;The existence of an independent English state is a very insult to our Unity ! Let us reclaim what is rightfully ours now that the English aren't able to act on the international stage !;;;;;;;;;;;;;
OCC_recognized_title;Occitan independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;
OCC_recognized_desc;With an independent Occitan government established
column2: the Dual-Monarchy is forced to stop claiming the lands in their possession;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: OCC_claim_title;Reclaim Occitania !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

OCC_claim_desc;The existence of an independent Occitan state is a very insult to our Unity ! Let us reclaim what is rightfully ours now that the Occitan aren't able to act on the international stage !;;;;;;;;;;;;;
IRE_recognized_title;Irish independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;
IRE_recognized_desc;With an independent Irish government controlling the Emerald Island the Dual-Monarchy will be forced to stop claiming Eire!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
IRE_claim_title;Reclaim Ireland;;;;;;;;;;;;;
IRE_claim_desc;Ireland was lost but with our power firmly established in the islands we can easily reclaim what was once ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
SCO_recognized_title;Scottish independence;;;;;;;;;;;;;
SCO_recognized_desc;With an independent Scottish government controlling both the Highlands and the Lowlands Scandinavia will be forced to stop claiming the home of the Stewarts!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
SCO_claim_title;Reclaim Scotland;;;;;;;;;;;;;
SCO_claim_desc;Scotland was lost but with our power firmly established in the Baltic we can easily reclaim what was once ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
the_pomor_annexation_title;Proclaim a Pomor Protectorate;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_pomor_annexation_desc;With Finland's place within Scandinavia now settled beyond doubt
column2: and Novgorod's unprecedented weakness
column3: the time has come to cement our dominance in the White Sea. This entails taking control of the Pomor settlements along the southern White Sea coast
column4: both to protect them from a Russian resurgence and to safeguard our eastern frontier. The Pomors do not possess a strong military or even a strong government
column5: and stand to gain much from Scandinavian economic and social institutions. Therefore they might simply accept annexation into Scandinavia if we make them an "offer" backed by sufficient force. If not
column6: it will mean war.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_DUA_ENL_title;The end of the Anglois dream;;;;;;;;;;;;;

end_DUA_ENL_desc;Paris still claims lands in the British islands despite the fact that we control all our lands and have won against them countless times. It is time that the World recognizes the end of the Anglois ambitions !;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_north_ENL_title;Speak English!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_north_ENL_desc;With an English government in control of Northern England we can change the names of the streets and cities to proper English;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_north_DUA_title;Speak Anglois!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_north_DUA_desc;With the Northern provinces brought into the fold we can rename the streets and cities to their proper names!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_south_ENL_title;London not LONDRES!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_south_ENL_desc;With the whole island controlled by England we can end the Anglois names on the island.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_south_DUA_title;Londres not LONDON!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
English_south_DUA_desc;With the southern coast controlled by our government we can rename the streets and cities!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

unite_ethiopia_4_desc;Ahmad ibn Ibrahim al-Ghazi the Conqueror was an Imam and General of Adal who invaded Ethiopia and defeated several Ethiopian emperors
column2: wreaking much damage on that kingdom. With the help of an army mainly composed of Somalis

column1: whistlestop_tour_title;Whistle Stop Tour;;;;;;;;;;;;;
whistlestop_tour_desc;With the advent of railways in our nation
column2: the idea has been suggested that our monarch tour the nation
column3: traveling from city to city by train. Some urge caution
column4: however
column5: for such public appearances could provide assassins with the opportunity to strike in provinces that are simmering with rebellion.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: address_the_nation_title;Address the Nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;
address_the_nation_desc;A speech was made today
column2: although the direct implications are obvious
column3: whether or not it will go down in history shall remain to be seen.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: gesture_of_defiance_title;Gesture of Defiance;;;;;;;;;;;;;

gesture_of_defiance_desc;We are a nation of growing power. It falls upon us to display to the so-called 'civilized' nations of the world that they cannot act with impunity. We will resist aggression in kind.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
exhibition_title;Exhibition (Classicism is abound!);;;;;;;;;;;;;
exhibition_desc;This is a chance to show the nations of the world our great state
column2: as such our status has risen in the eyes of many. May the nation continue to prosper under your care.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: exhibition2_title;Exhibition (The flourish of Romanticism);;;;;;;;;;;;;
exhibition2_desc;As time presses on
column2: so does the need to improve upon the ideals of the country. This new style of exhibition puts us above other countries around us
column3: to show that we are progressing to a greater era of prosperity for our nation. Most countries in the rest of the world are pleased with this change of events.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: exhibition3_title;Exhibition (The Realist movement);;;;;;;;;;;;;
exhibition3_desc;The saying that 'Time waits for noone' holds true for nations as well. New ideas are spreading through your country like wildfire
column2: many wish to hold a exhhibition to show the world these changes. This has improved your nation's image with the other countries.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: exhibition4_title;Exhibition (The beginnings of Impressionism);;;;;;;;;;;;;
exhibition4_desc; New ideas are abound in the nation again
column2: moreover the intellectuals of the nation has convinced us to 'donate' some money towards another exhibition. It was worth it in the end
column3: as nations around flocked to see what our nation has been doing lately.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: exhibition5_title;Exhibition (An impression left by Expressionism);;;;;;;;;;;;;
exhibition5_desc; Into the pockets of our great nations the intellectuals descend into. For another exhibition has been called
column2: and furthermore has shown the nations of the world that we are in the up and coming in terms of cultural development.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: exhibition6_title;Exhibition (The new fad!);;;;;;;;;;;;;
exhibition6_desc;The organizers of this latest exhibition have assured us that it will be about the latest 'fad' that has struck the world. A lot of our nation's people agree with this as well. Well
column2: other nations look at us in a better light
column3: so it was worth it in the end. Right?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

the_open_door_desc;The 'Open Door' immigration policy meant that racial and cultural barriers to immigration were lifted

column1: five_year_plan_title;Five Year Plan;;;;;;;;;;;;;
five_year_plan_desc;The proletariat state must guide the nation forward
column2: using a plan that takes into account all our needs and does not rely on bourgeois greed.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

purge_the_traitors_desc;The proletarian state has many enemies
column2: ones that do not see the larger plan and how it benefits us all. We must locate them and keep them from harming our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

military_parade_desc;Let us display our nation's armed forces in the streets. We are a power to be reckoned with

column1: citizenship_tests_title;Citizenship Tests;;;;;;;;;;;;;
citizenship_tests_desc;Those many immigrants that make their way to our lands will prove that they know what it means to be free.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
passports_title;Passports;;;;;;;;;;;;;

passports_desc;The demand on our government's immigration system has been immense. We must come up with new ways to ensure that the rights of our new citizens are protected and recognized by the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
conduct_census_title;Conduct Census;;;;;;;;;;;;;

conduct_census_desc;The make-up of our country's population has changed so much and so rapidly that it is clear an effort must be undertaken to catalogue our population. Let us discover who is who in our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
the_rights_of_man_title;The Rights of Man;;;;;;;;;;;;;
the_rights_of_man_desc;A recognition has begun among our people of the basic fundamental rights that all humanity shares. This is the first step in becoming a truly modern civilization.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
political_ideology_title;The New Ideology;;;;;;;;;;;;;
political_ideology_desc;New ideas have come to our nation
column2: and with them come new doctrines and principles that will change the foundations of how our people live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: of_state_n_government_title;Of State and Government;;;;;;;;;;;;;
of_state_n_government_desc;Our state is changing
column2: evolving from a simple government of bureaucrats and despots to a true organism of the state. We march into a modern era
column3: one where new ideas will tranform the way we live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: dreams_of_empire_title;Dreams of Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dreams_of_empire_desc;We dream not only of an empire to span the world
column2: but also of a cultural empire. Our people stand as civilized beings
column3: and it is our imperative to bestow the gift of our knowledge upon others. Let the world know of our desires
column4: for we shall find a place of prominence within it.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: the_means_of_production_title;The Means of Production;;;;;;;;;;;;;
the_means_of_production_desc;We have the means at our hands to be a nation of power and significance. We must exert that power responsibly
column2: for now we are a true citizen of the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: the_flaws_of_democracy_title;The Flaws of Democracy;;;;;;;;;;;;;
the_flaws_of_democracy_desc;The world is changing rapidly
column2: and bringing with it dangerous new doctines that threaten democratic principle. Whether our nation stands with those who desire freedom
column3: or seeks a different path will be ours to decide and ours alone.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

leave_soi_title;We Will Stand on our Own;;;;;;;;;;;;;
leave_soi_desc;Too long have we bent knee to unwanted foreigners. We must prove to them that our nation is a power to be reckoned with
column2: and reject their influence within our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: remove_leader_title;Remove the First Minister;;;;;;;;;;;;;
remove_leader_desc;Our beloved monarch does not fancy the current First Minister. Give him the sack and find another!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
land_of_opportunity_title;Land of Opportunity;;;;;;;;;;;;;
land_of_opportunity_desc;We are the Land of the Free and the Home of the Brave
column2: a bastion of democracy in the world and a haven for its poor and dispossessed.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

secret_police_desc;Sometimes

column3: the police must be given powers that trascend civil liberties.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: force_vassal_freedom_title;We Shall Be Free;;;;;;;;;;;;;
force_vassal_freedom_desc;A chance is upon us. Do we approach the great power who has so much influence in $COUNTRY$

column2: ruling both French and Italians. Long live Transalpina.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: treaty_of_paris_title;Treaty of Paris;;;;;;;;;;;;;
treaty_of_paris_desc;Our control of France is complete. We can now force the usurpers to come to negotiations and cede all the territories of the mainland to the rightful King of France.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
challenge_usurpers_title;Renew the War of the French Throne;;;;;;;;;;;;;
challenge_usurpers_desc;After the defeat of the Valois dynasty in the Hundred Years' War and the following annexation of their holdings
column2: Provence became their last stand. But thanks to our expansive efforts
column3: Provence is now strong enough to stand strong against the English usurpers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: reclaim_paris_PRV_title;Reclaim Paris;;;;;;;;;;;;;
reclaim_paris_PRV_desc;We have reclaimed Paris from the Plantagenets and can now make it our capital.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
reclaim_paris_DUA_title;Reclaim Paris;;;;;;;;;;;;;
reclaim_paris_DUA_desc;We have reclaimed Paris from the Valois and can now make it our capital.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_bretons_title;Integrate Bretons;;;;;;;;;;;;;

integrate_bretons_desc;While Bretons were not an integral part of the Capetian kingdom we have expelled the usurpers from this land nonetheless. We have a tradition of multiculturalism so it's normal to accept them too;;;;;;;;;;;;;
lucca_war_title;Pre-eminence in Etruria;;;;;;;;;;;;;

lucca_war_desc;The liberal republic of Etruria has been reduced to ashes with the King in France reclaiming his inheritance of Tuscany. But the duchy of Lucca has not accepted our renewed role in the area
column2: proclaiming being freed from any feudal links toward us. While it is an obscure claim
column3: we could always press it to strengthen our rule in Italy...;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: holy_crown_HUN_title;The Crown of San Stefen;;;;;;;;;;;;;
holy_crown_HUN_desc;The Holy Crown of Hungary
column2: the very embodiment of our state is in the hands of the Bohemian Kings who still like to pretend they are claimants to the throne. Alas for us no Hungarian King can be considered truly worthy of ruling until he has been crowned with the Holy Crown of Saint Stefen
column3: first King of Hungary. Now we can ask the Emperor to give us back the Crown but it will likely come with demands;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: HUN_prague_title;Force the Bohemians to Surrender;;;;;;;;;;;;;
HUN_prague_desc;With Prague under our control we can retake the crown of Saint Stefan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
BOH_buda_title;Force the Hungarians to Surrender;;;;;;;;;;;;;
BOH_buda_desc;With Budapest under our control we can force the Hungarians to concede defeat and return Slovakia to us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_iberia_title;Propose an Iberian union;;;;;;;;;;;;;

form_iberia_desc;Uniting Iberia was one of the ambitions of medieval monarchs of the Iberian peninsula. Sancho III of Navarre and Alfonso VII of León and Castile both took the title Imperator Totius Hispaniae"
column2: meaning ""Emperor of All Hispania"" centuries before. But with the rise of the Dual Monarchy in the East it was too dangerous for Castille to extend its territories and instead of the planned union with Aragon
column3: the Kingdom of Hispania was created by merging the crowns of Castille and Portugal. With our control of the former Aragonese lands of Catalunya we can proclaim the Iberian Union. But the question is: Will the Catalans accept our rule?";;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: integrate_navarra_title;Unify with Navarra;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_navarra_desc;To really become the Iberian Union we have to integrate the lands of the Basque people into our country;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_catalans_title;Catalan acceptance;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_catalans_desc;The Catalans nay have refused the unification at first but our important status in Europe has made them rethink about their previous actions;;;;;;;;;;;;;
emperor_of_india_title;The Empire of Indias;;;;;;;;;;;;;
emperor_of_india_desc;Our hold on Colombia is clearly a success. To raise our status among the European Powers and also in our colonies
column2: we can crown our King
column3: "Emperor de las Indias Occidentales" and thus give him a special place in the Royal Families of the Old Continent;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: mancomunidad_de_naciones_title;Mancomunidad de las naciones Colombianas;;;;;;;;;;;;;

mancomunidad_de_naciones_desc;Liberalisation has changed our society and the king no longer holds the same power as his forefathers. Our Prime Minister has presented us with a new proposal : grant home-rule to the colonies and create a Commonwealth grouping the metropolis and its colonies while crowning the sovereign in each Colombian state. It will surely make Spain and Colombia enter a new age of cordial relations and democracy;;;;;;;;;;;;;
cusco_capital_title;Move Capital to Cusco;Déplacer la capitale à Cusco;Verlegt die Haptstadt nach Cusco;;;;;;;;;;;
cusco_capital_desc;Finally
column2: we have taken back from the barbarian Westerners our imperial capital of Cusco! Let us establish their once more the capital of the glorious Inca realm.;Nous avons enfin repris notre capitale impériale des mains des barbares occidentaux! Réinstallons y à nouveau la capitale de la glorieuse nation inca.;Endlich haben wir unsere imperiale Hauptstadt Cusco wieder vor den westlichen Barbaren zurückerobert! Lasst uns ein weiteres mal die Hauptstadt des herrlichen Inka-Reiches dort gründen.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: empire_inca_title;An Empire of the Sun God;;;;;;;;;;;;;

empire_inca_desc;Thank Inti! Our brave armies have defeated the last foreigners and returned the control over our ancient lands to us. Now we should change the defense into charge! Let the Spanish taste the guns and cannons they tought us to make
column2: let the unstoppable high-tide blow over their lands!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: empire_inca_2_title;Tawantinsuyu Resurgent!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

empire_inca_2_desc;We have expelled all foreigners from beyond even the furthest reaches of the ancient empire. Even Pachacuti himself would be proud of our accomplishments! It is time we work towards reintigrating the mestizo peoples back into our empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_india_title;Form India;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_india_desc;The peoples of the Indian sub-continent must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_dravida_title;Form Dravida;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_dravida_desc;From the Indian Ocean to the Deccan Plateau
column2: along the mighty Narmanda and Krishna
column3: let us reclaim the mantle of Asoka the Wise and Adi Shankara. Our might
column4: courage
column5: and discipline have united this land once again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: form_bharata_title;Form Bharata;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_bharata_desc;From the Hindu Kush to Sri Lanka
column2: along the mighty Ganges and Indus
column3: let us reclaim the mantle of Asoka the Wise and the Great ancient empires. Call it Bharat
column4: Hindustan or Dravida
column5: today we have unified the whole subcontinent as one. Such a feat has not been acomplished since the time of Asoka the Great!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: AFG_punjab_title;The gate of India;;;;;;;;;;;;;

AFG_punjab_desc;The conquest of Punjab was fierce but the lack of leadership amongst the Panjabis after the death of Ranjit Singh allowed us to take control of many territories along the Indus. However the occupation is harsh and expensive with the Panjabis more numerous that all the Afghan tribes... But if we can take all of Punjab
column2: maybe a new path could emerge for the Sadozai
column3: and maybe they could enter the Indian game ....;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: seize_bengal_title;Retake Bengal;;;;;;;;;;;;;

seize_bengal_desc;Bengal has been a province of our Empire since its conquest by Akbar the Great in 1576. The Nasirid governors took advantage from our troubles to proclaim their independence and become Sultans but once the area will be in our hands
column2: none will deny us our legitimacy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: reclaim_old_empire_title;Reestablish the old borders;;;;;;;;;;;;;

reclaim_old_empire_desc;The Empire has regained the upper hand in the peninsula but it is far from its old standing. It is time to bring the Thai and the Champas under our leadership to regain pre-eminence in the region !;;;;;;;;;;;;;
become_sole_leader_title;The Khmer Peninsula;;;;;;;;;;;;;

become_sole_leader_desc;With the submission of both Thais and Champa we have regained the size of our ancestors empire. But we can't stop now ! It is time to spread our culture and dominion to the Burmese and the Viet and become the sole leader between India and China ! ;;;;;;;;;;;;;
shield_of_levant_title;Become the Shield of the Levant;;;;;;;;;;;;;
shield_of_levant_desc;Now when we have risen in status in the eyes of the Europeans
column2: we can start proclaiming our own imperialistic claims. We are now able to announce our right to be the true liberators of the Arabic people and protectors of the Levant.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: persiania_title;Persian Dream;;;;;;;;;;;;;

persiania_desc;With the fall of the Ottoman Empire our country was formed by an independentist Ottoman general. Iraq became an union of Persians and Iraqis - that is a dream we ought to pursue!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_italy_title;Avanti Italia!;Avanti Italia !;Avanti Italia!;;;;;;;;;;;
form_italy_desc;By establishing a dominant position on the Italian peninsula
column2: we can secure a national homeland for our people by proclaiming ourselves the motive power of a unified Italian state.;Grâce à l'établissement d'une position dominante sur la péninsule italienne
column3: nous formerons une patrie pour notre peuple en nous proclamant la force motrice d'un État italien unifié.;Durch die Absicherung einer dominanten Position auf der italienischen Halbinsel können wir unserem Volk eine nationale Heimat geben
column4: indem wir uns als treibende Kraft für eine vereinigte italienische Nation proklamieren.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: roma_capital_title;Move Capital to Rome;;;;;;;;;;;;;
roma_capital_desc;We have managed to gain control of the City of Cities. Under your leadership
column2: nothing can stop our nation now!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: venetians_culture_title;Integration of the Venetians;;;;;;;;;;;;;

venetians_culture_desc;The people under the government of the Serenissima have distinguished themselves from their Italians brothers because of their ties with the East. But now that Venice is in the hands of the Italian Nation
column2: it is our duty to fully integrate them into our national fabric;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: italia_irredenta_title;Italia Irredenta;Italia Irredenta;Italia Irredenta;;;;;;;;;;;

italia_irredenta_desc;The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper
column2: but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia
column3: and Austria.;Le mouvement irrédentiste voulait voir transférés à la couronne italienne tous les territoires limitrophes peuplés majoritairement ou en partie d'italiens. Cela concerne non seulement les possessions autrichiennes en Italie
column4: mais aussi des territoires en Dalmatie et en Autriche.;Die italienische Irredentistenbewegung strebte danach
column5: alle Gebiete in der unmittelbaren Umgebung des Königreichs Italien
column6: die tatsächlich oder vermeintlich größtenteils von Italienischstämmigen bewohnt wurden
column7: dem Königreich anzugliedern. Dies beinhaltete nicht nur Ansprüche auf österreichische Ländereien in italienischem Besitz
column8: sondern bedeutete auch territoriale Ansprüche weiter nach Dalmatien und Österreich hinein.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: savoy_of_italy_title;Construct Italy;;;;;;;;;;;;;

savoy_of_italy_desc;With the downfall of Aragon as a Great Power we have gained a very good possibility to fill the power vacuum in Italy through helping the Grand Duchy of Savoy to gain the Iron Crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
etrurian_manifesto_title;Etrurian Manifesto;;;;;;;;;;;;;
etrurian_manifesto_desc;The evil imperialist swines decided to cut their knives through our country and create borders of their own. People of Italy
column2: here me calling! We shall unite and free our brothers in one glorious revolutionary march! For Freedom!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: call_council_of_italy_title;Council of Italy;;;;;;;;;;;;;
call_council_of_italy_desc;With the recent flourishing of Liberal ideas
column2: the time is ripe for us to unite Italy. We shall call a council of Italian states to further the cause for a united Italy free of foreign influence. If the council is successful
column3: we will be able to bring Italy into this new age of Liberalism and Industry.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: help_germany_title;The heart of the Revolution;;;;;;;;;;;;;

help_germany_desc;Germany was the heart of the Revolution but alas the old Republican flame is nowhere to be seen across the Alpes. Our Republic has the duty of helping our fellow revolutionaries to have a solid ally in the North! We need to pay caution though since it will surely not be to the liking of Burgundy and Bohemia...;;;;;;;;;;;;;
build_the_ponte_liberta_title;Build the Ponte della Liberta;;;;;;;;;;;;;

build_the_ponte_liberta_desc;Venice has benefited from most of its history of being an island. But the changes of our modern world and the advance of the railways have rendered Venice quite isolated from other urban centres. We could boost immigration by creating a bridge linking the City of the Doges to the rest of Europe.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
risanamento_VEN_title;Risanamento;;;;;;;;;;;;;

risanamento_VEN_desc;Many urban centres underwent great transformations in the XIXth century to improve hygiena and salubrity along with building the necessary facilities for the modern life. Venice is in fact in dire needs of a great restoration
column2: aimed at negating the problems of being an island city
column3: surrounded by water and marshes. Some of our monuments could also be improved to reflect our international standing.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: extand_the_arsenal_title;Improving the Arsenal;;;;;;;;;;;;;
extand_the_arsenal_desc;The Arsenal of Venice was the biggest shipyard in Europe for centuries
column2: helping Venice to secure the Mediterranean with its galleys. Nowadays the days of the galleys are over but we could change the Arsenal into a Modern Shipyard
column3: helping us to secure the Mediterranean and our overseas possessions!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: integrate_athesians_title;Integration of Athesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;

integrate_athesians_desc;The Colony of Athesia and Eleuthera has had a complicated relationship with the metropolis. It was thanks to Venice that settlers were defended from the Seminole tribes and could develop the peninsula and the archipelago to its current level but the need for reform was not acknowledged and insurrections tore the trust between Athesians and Venice. However our continued hold on Athesiahave allowed us to make our rule accepted by the locals.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dalmatia_VEN_title;Integration of Dalmatia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dalmatia_VEN_desc;Dalmatia was the first target of expansion of the Republic in the XIIth century
column2: and Venice has held onto it for despite the various Turkish wars. Recently the independence of Illiria had led to increased nationalism from the Croatian inhabitants but despite this our rule has been confirmed.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: japanese_korea_title;Restore the order in Korea;;;;;;;;;;;;;
japanese_korea_desc;The Korean rebellion is finally crushed and our peaceful rule over the peninsula may continue.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
korean_korea_title;Enforce peace;;;;;;;;;;;;;
korean_korea_desc;With Korea fully under our control
column2: we can now enforce peace with Japan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: japanese_korea_repeat_title;Conquer Korea;;;;;;;;;;;;;
japanese_korea_repeat_desc;The Koreans and their allies defeated us last time
column2: but now that we are better prepared it is time to resolve the issue once and for all!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: japanese_offer_title;The Seoul Treaty;;;;;;;;;;;;;
japanese_offer_desc;With our expansion being so successful
column2: we might persuade the Manchus to give up some of their territory without bloodshed.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: japanese_ainu_title;Annex the Ainu Protectorate;;;;;;;;;;;;;
japanese_ainu_desc;As we plan to continue our colonisation efforts in the north
column2: we should seize direct control over the Ainu territories.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: man_in_the_castle_title;The Man in the High Castle;;;;;;;;;;;;;

man_in_the_castle_desc;The Chinese colonists founded the Dong Guo federation long time ago and since then it has developed into a full-fledged country. But somehow they stand in way of establishing total control over the Pacific.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
annex_hawaii_title;Annex Hawaii;;;;;;;;;;;;;
annex_hawaii_desc;The Hawaiians have escaped the notice of the outside powers which took so much interest in them decades ago. Yet their lands have not remained isolated
column2: but have come under the influence of $THISCOUNTRY$ . Our countrymen roam Hawaii's streets
column3: our merchants ply their trades in Hawaii's towns
column4: our missionaries preach to Hawaii's people
column5: and our culture has begun to fascinate the Hawaiians. Across the islands
column6: the presence of $THISCOUNTRY$ has become utterly dominant. Even their institutions have begun to subtly reshape themselves in our image. Let us end this charade and make our annexation of Hawaii official.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: bonin_administration_title;Japanese Bonin;;;;;;;;;;;;;
bonin_administration_desc;Japan now controls the archipelago
column2: and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change them accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: taiwan_administration_title;Japanese Formosa;;;;;;;;;;;;;
taiwan_administration_desc;Japan now controls Formosa
column2: and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change the island accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: puppet_Manchuria_title;Organizing Manchukuo;;;;;;;;;;;;;

puppet_Manchuria_desc;Our expansion has given us the rich lands of Manchuria. Their goods will be very important for our industry but the numerous local population could resist us. Let us establish a puppet state under the rule of a Manchu prince which will allow us to better control the local population.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
organize_yakutia_title;Organizing Yakutia;;;;;;;;;;;;;

organize_yakutia_desc;The frozen Seihoku lands would be interesting to exploit but the lack of population and the unwillingness from our citizens to move there does not allow us to benefit fully from it
column2: worse
column3: these lands cost us much. We could create another Co-prosperity sphere member by 'civilizing' the Yakut tribes and then grant us sovereignty over all the inland Seihoku lands we possess.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: khans_of_khazaks_title;Form the Kingdom of the Khazaks;;;;;;;;;;;;;
khans_of_khazaks_desc;With civilization finally comes our nation
column2: our pride - union of the Kazaks. Let the steppe eagle fly to the future
column3: full of glory
column4: power under the leadership of the $MONARCHTITLE$.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: reform_the_grand_duchy_title;Reform the Grand Duchy;;;;;;;;;;;;;

reform_the_grand_duchy_desc;The Grand Duchy of Lithuania was one of the mightiest Eastern European nations. It became a part of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. With its fall she can rise again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
unite_livonia_title;The Kingdom of Livonia;La confédération livonienne;The Livonian Confederation;;;;;;;;;;;
unite_livonia_desc;After centuries of foreign oppression
column2: Riga the heart of Livonia is back in the control of the rightful rulers of the Grand-Duchy of Livonia. Now we can reunify Kurland with Livonia and proclaim the independent Kingdom of Livonia
column3: the home of the Baltic Germans !;Après des siècles de domination étrangère
column4: les peuples baltes sont unis sous notre drapeau. Proclamons la confédération livonienne
column5: l'état de tous les baltes!;After centuries of foreign oppression
column6: the Baltic people are now united under our flag. Let us proclaim the Livonian Confederation
column7: the state of all the Baltics citizens!;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: restore_macedonia_title;Restore the Macedonian Rule over Greece;Restaurer le contrôle macédonien sur la Grèce;Restore the Macedonian Rule over Greece;;;;;;;;;;;
restore_macedonia_desc;In the classical era
column2: Macedonians managed to gain control of Greece. But their empire was trashed and Macedonia subdued. Now when we have managed to reconquer what is rightfully ours
column3: we can reform the empire of Philip of Macedon;A l'époque classique
column4: les Macédoniens avaient conquît la Grèce. Mais leur empire s'effondra et la Macédoine fut vaincu. Maintenant que nous avons repris ces terres qui nous reviennent
column5: nous pouvons reformer l'empire de Philippe de Macédoine.;In the classical era
column6: Macedonians managed to gain control of Greece. But their empire was trashed and Macedonia subdued. Now when we have managed to reconquer what is rightfully ours
column7: we can reform the empire of Philip of Macedon;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: macedi_idea_title;Rebuild the Alexander's Empire;Reconstruire l'Empire d'Alexandre;Rebuild the Alexander's Empire;;;;;;;;;;;
macedi_idea_desc;Alexander the Great
column2: son of Philip
column3: managed to conquer everything between Athens and far-away India. With our rise among the Great Powers of the world
column4: we can start thinking about rebuilding it  - starting with the conquest of the Asia Minor.;Alexandre le Grand réussit à conquérir toutes les terres entre Athènes et l'Inde lointaine. Maintenant que nous sommes reconnus comme une des Grandes Puissances de la planète
column5: nous pouvons commencer à le reconstruire - à commencer par le conquête de l'Asie mineure.;Alexander the Great
column6: son of Philip
column7: managed to conquer everything between Athens and far-away India. With our rise among the Great Powers of the world
column8: we can start thinking about rebuilding it  - starting with the conquest of the Asia Minor.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: to_north_title;Align with the Yugoslavians;Alignement avec la Yougoslavie;Align with the Yugoslavians;;;;;;;;;;;
to_north_desc;Thanks to our friendship with our northern neighbors
column2: we are now able to abandon our absurd Greek roots and enter the land of future - South Slavia!;Notre amitié avec nos voisins au nord nous permet d'abandonner nos vieilles racines grecques et de nous préparer un futur avec les Yougoslaves!;Thanks to our friendship with our northern neighbors
column3: we are now able to abandon our absurd Greek roots and enter the land of future - South Slavia!;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: challenge_greece_title;Hegemonia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
challenge_greece_desc;The Conference of Naples of 1824 had given to our King the assent of both Greeks and Bulgarians to rule over Macedonia
column2: and many in the assembly had hoped that Macedonia could also free the rest of Greece. Now an upstart rule in Athens and it is the duty of the Makedonias House to end this petty kingdom and unify Greece!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: vin_manifest_destiny_title;Destiny of the North;;;;;;;;;;;;;
vin_manifest_destiny_desc;We should spread our greatness across all of northern Arcadia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
nbg_manifest_destiny_title;Destiny of the East;;;;;;;;;;;;;
nbg_manifest_destiny_desc;We should spread our greatness across all of eastern Arcadia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
pla_manifest_destiny_title;Destiny of the South;;;;;;;;;;;;;
pla_manifest_destiny_desc;We should spread our greatness across all of southern Arcadia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dng_manifest_destiny_title;Destiny of the West;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dng_manifest_destiny_desc;We should spread our greatness across all of western Arcadia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
athesia_purchase_title; The Athesian Purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;

athesia_purchase_desc; The Venetian colony of Athesia is located on a major strategic point. The port of Rialto watches most of ships passing through the Athesian strait and thus controls the traffic going in and out la Baie de Nouvelle-France. Since Venice has been declining lately
column2: it might be the occasion to acquire this territory in exchange of some money;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: athesia_force_title; Ultimatum for Athesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
athesia_force_desc; Despite our generous proposal
column2: Venice has not let Athesia go. Now it is time to revert to force and to show them that one does not treat us like a minor power ....;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: habana_purchase_title; The Habanan purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;
habana_purchase_desc; With our control over Athesia established
column2: it is time to turn our eyes south. The island of Habana is the only colony that did not join Gran Colombia during the war of independence. It is one of the last Spanish holdings in the New World and it holds a strategic position. To be free from any intervention or disruption of commerce in the Gulf of Mexico
column3: we must control the island. It will require however a large amount of cash and even that will not bind Spain to give Habana...;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: ayiti_purchase_title; The Sudurhafeyjar Purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;

ayiti_purchase_desc; Scandinavia still holds the archipelago they called the Islands of the South consisting of Righavn and Ayiti. Buying these islands would strengthen even more our position in the Caribbean;;;;;;;;;;;;;
jamaica_purchase_title; The Eendrachtsland Purchase;;;;;;;;;;;;;

jamaica_purchase_desc; Burgundy still holds the island of Eendrachtsland in the Caribbean. This little island does not present an importance as great as Habana or Ayiti but it would improve our standing in Arcadia even more if we acquired this island.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
buy_falklands_title;Buy the Falklands;;;;;;;;;;;;;

buy_falklands_desc;We have lost the Falkland Islands to the Scandinavians and no one objected their seizure. But now they are not recognized as a Great power anymore we could offer to buy the islands for a hefty price;;;;;;;;;;;;;
dissolve_CLM_title;Dissolve the Federation;;;;;;;;;;;;;

dissolve_CLM_desc;This war has shown us something. The former Spanish colonies united under the same flag are a threat to our influence in Arcadia and Ameriga. Some in our government have suggested that we make Gran Colombia dissolve itself in little states easier to control and manipulate. Thus there will only be one power in the New-World
odensmark_title;The Great White North;;;;;;;;;;;;;
odensmark_desc;With our position secured in Northern Arcadia we can occupy the lands we claim in the West !;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Takikawa_title;Advancing into Arcadia;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Takikawa_desc;The Kaiganese colony has always claimed the remote Takikawa region as her rightful lands and with Odensmark and Tangwan falling under the control of other powers it might be wise move to take this region too.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Takikawa_2_title;The Great North;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Takikawa_2_desc;The remote area of Takikawa was discovered by the Kaiganese at the beginning of the century but its remoteness and lack of resources has left it empty. But now that all nearby territories are colonized it might be better for us to settle that territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_kita_title;Integration of the Kaiganese;;;;;;;;;;;;;
integrate_kita_desc;Kita Kaigan is the neighbour with whom we share the most
column2: a lot thanks to our common Asiatic origins. The Kaiganese though are too little and weak to protect themselves so it is better if we just annex them and integrate them.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: form_mejico_title;Force our rule over Ciudad de Mexico;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_mejico_desc;Because of the massive failure of the aftermath of the Independence Wars
column2: the people of Mexico lost their unity. Shall the Mexican Eagle rise again?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: embrace_mexican_unity_title;Embrace Mexican unity;;;;;;;;;;;;;
embrace_mexican_unity_desc;We can abandon the idea of united Gran Colombia and instead focus on the integration of natives living in our lands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_union_nation_title;Form $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$;Formation de $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$;$CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$ gründen;;;;;;;;;;;

form_union_nation_desc;Our dominant position among our cultural brethren puts us in a position to form $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$.;Notre position dominante parmi nos frères culturels nous permet de former $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$.;Unsere dominante Position unter unseren kulturellen Brüdern hat uns in die Position gebracht
column2: $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$ zu gründen.;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: organize_indonesia_title;Organize Indonesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
organize_indonesia_desc;Our colonies in the East Indies are becoming a true part of the country. We must create the proper structures
column2: so that they stand on par with our other national states.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: reorganize_indonesia_title;Claim Indonesia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
reorganize_indonesia_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this East Indies colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: organize_christiania_title;Organize Christiania;;;;;;;;;;;;;
organize_christiania_desc;Our colonies in the East Indies are becoming a true part of the country. We must create the proper structures
column2: so that they stand on par with our other national states.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: reorganize_christiania_title;Claim Christiania;;;;;;;;;;;;;
reorganize_christiania_desc;Now that we have taken possession of Christiania
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: organize_terra_d_oro_title;Organize Terra d'Oro;;;;;;;;;;;;;
organize_terra_d_oro_desc;With the Scramble for Africa launched the colony of Terra d'Oro should be formally organized to better rule over our African territories;;;;;;;;;;;;;
organize_sierra_leone_title;Organize Sierra Leone;;;;;;;;;;;;;
organize_sierra_leone_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure

They suffer many discriminations in our country despite the fact that they are civilized and speak a better Afrikaner than the Burgundian settlers around Kaapstadt. If we can rally a significant political force to support reform we could make them proper citizens of our state.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

bring_it_on_desc;Due to the world being so generous towards less gifted nations of the world
