selon_treaty_desc;With Spain falling out of grace
column2: we do not have to abide by the rules set by the Treaty of Selon anymore.;With Spain falling out of grace
column3: we do not have to abide by the rules set by the Treaty of Selon anymore.;With Spain falling out of grace
column4: we do not have to abide by the rules set by the Treaty of Selon anymore.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: secure_south_granada_title;End of Incan Claims;;;;;;;;;;;;;

secure_south_granada_desc;The Quechua people inhabiting Granada have been pushing for reunification with the indigenous Incan Empire for centuries and often stage protests and revolts against our rule. But now with our power asserted amongst the powers of the World and our influence in the Incan Empire we can force the Quechua to relinquish any claims on our territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
create_gendarmeria_title;Creation of the Gendarmeria Federal;;;;;;;;;;;;;
create_gendarmeria_desc;The federal nature of our state poses serious problems for maintaining order
column2: with the various police forces underfunded by the local authorities
column3: lacking proper training and squabbling over jurisdictions. The central government has proposed the creation of a Federal Force inspired by European methods
column4: the Federal Gendarmerie which will be able to act over our whole territory as to severely hinder the rebellious elements of our population.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: conquer_old_england_title;Claim Old England;;;;;;;;;;;;;
conquer_old_england_desc;England has been reborn from the ashes but it isn't guided by the rightful King
column2: ours who sits in Camelot. With our power we can claim the island for ourselves and impose our will on the English people!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: Beornian_Cone_title;The Amerigan Cone;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Beornian_Cone_desc;Beornia has battled for centuries with the Mapuche and the Incas for the control of the south of the continent. Rather than limit ourselves to the uncivilized pampas of the south we can also claim the southern Incan provinces
column2: cross the Andes and claim the Pacific!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: sponsor_transcontinental_title;Sponsor the Trans-Continental Railroad;;;;;;;;;;;;;
sponsor_transcontinental_desc;The links between Porto Novo and Nova Lisboa are tenuous at best
column2: and it is with great difficulty that people travel from one ocean to another in Lusitania. The advent of the railroads could alleviate this problem if we were to sponsor a company that would link the two cities and the two seas. It would moreover dynamize relations with Qingqiu in the West and the rest of Arcadia to the East.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: accept_SLO_title;Integrating Slovenia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
accept_SLO_desc;The Slovenians are a South Slavic people
column2: much like ours although their language is quite different from Croat. They are also Catholic
column3: contrary to the Serbs or the Bosniaks. Making them accept our rule should not be difficult
column4: even more so with the Austrian threat in the North.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: independent_SLO_title;Independent Slovenia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
independent_SLO_desc;Slovenia is now in Slavic hands and the claims of the Germans on our territory are forfeit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
croatian_compromise_title;The Croatian Compromise;;;;;;;;;;;;;

croatian_compromise_desc;The Croatians while not Magyar had enjoyed great rights under the personal union of the two kingdoms in the Middle-Ages. The Croatian Hungarian Settlement acknowledged the long-standing autonomy of Croatia within Hungary. It allowed the formation of a Croatian Parliament and gave seats to Croatian MPs in Budapest. With this compromise
column2: we recognise Croatians as full citizens of our state.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: reclaim_croatia_title;The Crown of Tomislav;;;;;;;;;;;;;

reclaim_croatia_desc;The fate of Croatia and Hungary were linked for centuries following the personal union of the two kingdoms and the crowning of László I. Sadly the Croats preffered to create their own kingdom
column2: distinct from old Croatia and thus distinct of the reborn Hungarian Kingdom. It is now time we made our own claims on Croatia and once again gain access to the sea !;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: Cuba_CLM_title;Join with Colombia;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Cuba_CLM_desc;We are independent but Gran Colombia still stands strong so it might be a better idea to join them.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
romanian_cherson_title;Romanian Transnistria;;;;;;;;;;;;;

romanian_cherson_desc;The Dniester has never been a fixed border for the Romanian people with many Moldavians choosing to cross the river and establish themselves in various settlements. It is our duty to claim this territory to protect our brothers and increase our national territory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
enabling_crisis_title;AI: Crisis Enabled;;;;;;;;;;;;;
enabling_crisis_desc;Crisis are enabled.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
conquer_old_portugal_title;Claim the Portuguese Fatherland;;;;;;;;;;;;;

conquer_old_portugal_desc;Portugal has been reborn from the ashes but its independence is not safe from the Spanish oppressors. With our power we can claim our fatherland for ourselves return it to greatness!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
claim_old_portugal_title;Livre Portugal!;;;;;;;;;;;;;
claim_old_portugal_desc;Starting as a band of immigrants fleeing oppression in Portugal we have carved out a free
column2: independent nation for ourselves in the desert of Arcadia. Now we are strong enough to once again challenge the Spanish tyrants that drove us from our lands and return home to Portugal.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: return_home_POR_title;Pátria Lusitana;;;;;;;;;;;;;

return_home_POR_desc;With control over all the old territory of the Kingdom of Portugal we can declare the re-establishment of a new independent Portuguese state. Plans to move the seat of government back to Portugal itself are already underway
column2: and jubilant crowds celebrate on the streets of Lisboa. Forced under the Spanish yoke centuries ago today we have accomplished our fathers' dreams: Portugal is free once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: casa_do_livre_title;Casa da Liberdade;;;;;;;;;;;;;

casa_do_livre_desc;The old colonial capital of Nova Lisboa is no longer appropriate as the seat of government of a federalised country like Lusitania. Many are suggesting the establishment of a brand new geographically central and regionally neutral capital in the middle of the Lusitanian desert. The state of the art Casa da Liberdade
column2: meaning "House of Freedom" in Portuguese
column3: will lie in central Lusitania and house the Congress and other important government buildings.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: Southern_Border_title;The Southern Border;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Southern_Border_desc;With Mexico forced to recognize our independence and dominance in the region
column2: eyes have turned to the Mexican states along our southern border. Much of this territory once fell under the Viceroyalty of New Portugal
column3: but was taken from us by the Spanish and given to the Mexicans. Perhaps it is now time to reclaim our lost territory and ensure the South never poses a threat to our independence and freedom again?;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: LST_recognized_title;Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo;;;;;;;;;;;;;

LST_recognized_desc;We have warded off Mexican attempts to rob us of our independence and are now in a position to force them to recognize our control over the lands of the former Viceroyalty of New Portugal. The new treaty with the Mexicans will see them relinquish their claims on our land and pledge to respect the unconditional liberty and independence of Lusitania.;;;;;;;;;;;;;
savoi_at_last_desc;The Kings of Burgundy fought quite heavily with the Swiss Cantons in the XVth and XVIth centuries for the control of Geneva and Neuchatel
column2: finally securing their rule as Dukes of Genève in the treaty of Bern of 1613 that ended their rivalry with their Swiss neighbour. Genève became then the centre of the Romand culture
column3: and a distinct Alpine identity emerged between the valleys of Savoy and Valais. The Burgundian claim to Savoy is tenuous at best but a decisive war against the Italian Duke could easily be used as a rallying cry for the Romand people. Furthermore it would allow us to secure the Alpine passes that our rivals covet.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: savoi_at_last2_desc;We can ensure the independence of the Romand people by removing all claims of other powers in our Alpine valleys.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
savoi_at_last3_desc;The Kings of Burgundy fought quite heavily with the Swiss Cantons in the XVth and XVIth centuries for the control of Geneva and Neuchatel
column2: finally securing their rule as Dukes of Genève in the treaty of Bern of 1613 that ended their rivalry with their Swiss neighbour. Genève became then the centre of the Romand culture
column3: and a distinct Alpine identity emerged between the valleys of Savoy and Valais. The Burgundian claim to Savoy is tenuous at best but a decisive war against the Italian Duke could easily be used as a rallying cry for the Romand people. Furthermore it would allow us to secure the Alpine passes that our rivals covet.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: Greater_Romandy_BRG_title;Burgundian Romandy;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Greater_Romandy_BRG_desc;Our conquest of the Alpine valleys possessed by the Duke of Savoy has secured our southern flank from a possible Italian attack and eliminated any prospects the Anglois may have had on this territory. But even with all that the people of Romandy are not integrated into our state. Geneva has been in our possession for centuries and many Romand nationalists would accept our rule if we could free their brethren in the Dauphiné;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Kingdom_of_the_Burgondes_title;The Kingdom of Arles;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Kingdom_of_the_Burgondes_desc;The title of Burgundy has held many meanings over the centuries
column2: with the Burgundian tribe securing their power along the Rhone and the Alps. The kingdom of Burgundy
column3: centered around the city of Arles would exist for much of the Middle-Ages until the house of Valois-Bourgogne reclaimed the title for their old demesne. Between the many Romands inhabiting the Dauphiné and the staunch Protestantism of the heirs of Zwingli
column4: we could enforce our ancestral claim and secure an important Mediterranean port.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: restore_kitara_title;Revive the Empire of Light;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

restore_kitara_desc;Centuries ago the people living around lake 'Nnalubaale were united under the banner of the Empire of Kitara. With our dominance over this region we can revive this empire to unite its people and resist the invading Europeans.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
improve_kampala_title;A Modern Capital;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
improve_kampala_desc;To be taken seriously by the other powers of the world
column2: the capital of our great nation must be up the standards seen in Europe
column3: Arcadia
column4: and Ameriga. Though it will take great effort
column5: we can reshape the land to give our nation its first true urban center.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: found_kampala_academy_title;The Kitaran Academy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

found_kampala_academy_desc;The academy of Kitara will provide a place for the nation's greatest thinkers to meet and discuss new technologies and ideas that shall catapult Kitara into its rightful place among nations. The infrastructure for this academy will also support a world class university that can support students from across the nation and perhaps even all of Africa.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_expansion_s_title;Conquest of Unyamezi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_expansion_s_desc;The lands of Unyamezi are in the hands of another power. Securing them would help unite all the people of Kitara;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_expansion_w_title;Expand Into the Congo Basin;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_expansion_w_desc;To the west lies the lands of Lunda and Azande
column2: weak peoples who would be easy to conquer and integrate into the nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kitara_expansion_e_title;Bring the Luo into the Nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_expansion_e_desc;The Luo people share strong cultural ties to the people of Kitara. It should be easy to convince their leaders that they should belong in our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_expansion_sea_title;Conquest Towards the Sea;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

kitara_expansion_sea_desc;The Empire deserves access to the sea! We are the heirs to the divine Kitara of old! It is only right that we use our strength to conquer a coastline for ourselves!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_bantu_title;Welcome Our Bantu Brothers;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kitara_bantu_desc;While the Nyamwezi and Sukuma have some strange customs
column2: they are similar to the people of the Kitaran nation in many ways and share an origin. It would be foolish not to recognize them as an integral part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_MLT_title;Ending the Alfonsine Concession;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_MLT_desc;The Knights have been settled in Malta for centuries
column2: after the Grandmaster of the Order played a major role in the reconquest of the island from the Ottomans in 1573. King Alfons VI Borja then gave the island to the order in exchange for a ceremonial Maltese Falcon to be given to the viceroy of Sicily to affirm Aragonese ultimate sovereignty on the island. The Order has served its purpose well in the early Modern era
column3: but is now a decadent state that would be better under our rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: MLT_refute_ARA_title;Refute Aragonese Claims;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
MLT_refute_ARA_desc;$THIS_COUNTRY$ has finally been released from the shackles of Aragon
column2: our former overlord. It is time we end their whole claims on our islands. Malta will never be subjugated again !;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
